0100111011101001 0101110001010111 1 -> sum: 1010101101000001, cout: 0
1110100011011111 0011101000001011 0 -> sum: 0010001011101010, cout: 1

1011101110010100 0001101010000001 0 -> sum: 1101011000010101, cout: 0
